channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Musk sues Apple and OpenAI, accusing them of being ‘monopolists’ in AI space
item.description: The complaint portrays Apple as a company that views AI as an “existential threat” to its future success, prompting it to collude with OpenAI.

item.title: Trump signs proclamation honoring service members slain in Abbey Gate attack in Afghanistan
item.description: President Trump Monday honored U.S. military members killed in the Abbey Gate disaster in Kabul, Afghanistan four years ago.

item.title: Epstein’s estate subpoenaed by House Oversight Committee
item.description: It's the latest effort by both Republicans and Democrats to respond to public clamor for more disclosure in the investigation into Epstein.

item.title: Slashing the Intelligence Office Workforce Is Just a Start
item.description: Creating the Office of the Director of National Intelligence was a mistake. Short of its being erased, it needs to be streamlined and reformed.
